servers.description: The Xero Accounting API exposes accounting and related functions of the main Xero application and can be used for a variety of purposes such as creating transactions like invoices and credit notes, right through to extracting accounting data via our reports endpoint.

get.summary: Retrieves the full chart of accounts

200.description: Success - return response of type Accounts array with 0 to n Account

put.summary: Creates a new chart of accounts

200.description: Success - created new Account and return response of type Accounts array with new Account

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

requestBody.description: Account object in body of request

get.summary: Retrieves a single chart of accounts by using a unique account Id

200.description: Success - return response of type Accounts array with one Account
Success - update existing Account and return response of type Accounts array with updated Account

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

requestBody.description: Request of type Accounts array with one Account

200.description: Success - delete existing Account and return response of type Accounts array with deleted Account

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

get.summary: Retrieves attachments for a specific accounts by using a unique account Id

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array of Attachment

get.summary: Retrieves a specific attachment from a specific account using a unique attachment Id

200.description: Success - return response of attachment for Account as binary data

get.summary: Retrieves an attachment for a specific account by filename

200.description: Success - return response of attachment for Account as binary data

post.summary: Updates attachment on a specific account by filename

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array of Attachment

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

requestBody.description: Byte array of file in body of request

put.summary: Creates an attachment on a specific account

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array of Attachment

requestBody.description: Byte array of file in body of request

get.summary: Retrieves all contacts in a Xero organisation

parameters.name: IDs
parameters.description: Filter by a comma separated list of ContactIDs. Allows you to retrieve a specific set of contacts in a single call.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: e.g. page=1 - Up to 100 contacts will be returned in a single API call.

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: e.g. includeArchived=true - Contacts with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

parameters.name: searchTerm
parameters.description: Search parameter that performs a case-insensitive text search across the Name, FirstName, LastName, ContactNumber and EmailAddress fields.

200.description: Success - return response of type Contacts array with 0 to N Contact

put.summary: Creates multiple contacts (bulk) in a Xero organisation

200.description: Success - return response of type Contacts array with newly created Contact

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

requestBody.description: Contacts with an array of Contact objects to create in body of request

post.summary: Updates or creates one or more contacts in a Xero organisation

200.description: Success - return response of type Contacts array with newly created Contact

400.description: Validation Error - some data was incorrect returns response of type Error

get.summary: Retrieves a specific contact by contact number in a Xero organisation

parameters.name: ContactNumber
parameters.description: This field is read only on the Xero contact screen, used to identify contacts in external systems (max length = 50).

200.description: Success - return response of type Contacts array with a unique Contact

get.summary: Retrieves a specific contacts in a Xero organisation using a unique contact Id

200.description: Success - return response of type Contacts array with a unique Contact

post.summary: Updates a specific contact in a Xero organisation

200.description: Success - return response of type Contacts array with an updated Contact

requestBody.description: an array of Contacts containing single Contact object with properties to update

get.summary: Retrieves attachments for a specific contact in a Xero organisation

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array with 0 to N Attachment

get.summary: Retrieves a specific attachment from a specific contact using a unique attachment Id

200.description: Success - return response of attachment for Contact as binary data

get.summary: Retrieves a specific attachment from a specific contact by file name

200.description: Success - return response of attachment for Contact as binary data
Success - return response of type Attachments array with an updated Attachment

requestBody.description: Byte array of file in body of request

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array with an newly created Attachment

requestBody.description: Byte array of file in body of request

get.summary: Retrieves CIS settings for a specific contact in a Xero organisation

200.description: Success - return response of type CISSettings for a specific Contact

get.summary: Retrieves history records for a specific contact

put.summary: Creates a new history record for a specific contact

get.summary: Retrieves sales invoices or purchase bills

parameters.name: IDs
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of InvoicesIDs.

parameters.name: InvoiceNumbers
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of InvoiceNumbers.

parameters.name: ContactIDs
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list of ContactIDs.

parameters.name: Statuses
parameters.description: Filter by a comma-separated list Statuses. For faster response times we recommend using these explicit parameters instead of passing OR conditions into the Where filter.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: e.g. page=1 – Up to 100 invoices will be returned in a single API call with line items shown for each invoice

parameters.name: includeArchived
parameters.description: e.g. includeArchived=true - Invoices with a status of ARCHIVED will be included in the response

parameters.name: createdByMyApp
parameters.description: When set to true you'll only retrieve Invoices created by your app

200.description: Success - return response of type Invoices array with all Invoices

put.summary: Creates one or more sales invoices or purchase bills

200.description: Success - return response of type Invoices array with newly created Invoice

requestBody.description: Invoices with an array of invoice objects in body of request

post.summary: Updates or creates one or more sales invoices or purchase bills

200.description: Success - return response of type Invoices array with newly created Invoice

get.summary: Retrieves a specific sales invoice or purchase bill using a unique invoice Id

200.description: Success - return response of type Invoices array with specified Invoices

post.summary: Updates a specific sales invoices or purchase bills

200.description: Success - return response of type Invoices array with updated Invoice

get.summary: Retrieves invoices or purchase bills as PDF files

200.description: Success - return response of byte array pdf version of specified Invoices

get.summary: Retrieves attachments for a specific invoice or purchase bill

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array of Attachments for specified Invoices

get.summary: Retrieves a specific attachment from a specific invoices or purchase bills by using a unique attachment Id

200.description: Success - return response of attachment for Invoice as binary data

get.summary: Retrieves an attachment from a specific invoice or purchase bill by filename

200.description: Success - return response of attachment for Invoice as binary data

post.summary: Updates an attachment from a specific invoices or purchase bill by filename

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array with updated Attachment

requestBody.description: Byte array of file in body of request

put.summary: Creates an attachment for a specific invoice or purchase bill by filename

200.description: Success - return response of type Attachments array with newly created Attachment

requestBody.description: Byte array of file in body of request

get.summary: Retrieves a URL to an online invoice

200.description: Success - return response of type OnlineInvoice array with one OnlineInvoice

post.summary: Sends a copy of a specific invoice to related contact via email

get.summary: Retrieves history records for a specific invoice

put.summary: Creates a history record for a specific invoice

scopes.email: Grant read-only access to your email
scopes.openid: Grant read-only access to your open id
scopes.accounting.contacts: Grant read-write access to contacts and contact groups
scopes.accounting.contacts.read: Grant read-only access to contacts and contact groups
scopes.accounting.reports.read: Grant read-only access to accounting reports
scopes.accounting.settings: Grant read-write access to organisation and account settings
scopes.accounting.settings.read: Grant read-only access to organisation and account settings
scopes.accounting.transactions: Grant read-write access to bank transactions, credit notes, invoices, repeating invoices
scopes.paymentservices: Grant read-write access to payment services

historyRecords.description: HistoryRecords containing an array of HistoryRecord objects in body of request

summarizeErrors.name: summarizeErrors
summarizeErrors.description: If false return 200 OK and mix of successfully created objects and any with validation errors

unitdp.name: unitdp
unitdp.description: e.g. unitdp=4 – (Unit Decimal Places) You can opt in to use four decimal places for unit amounts

ifModifiedSince.name: If-Modified-Since
ifModifiedSince.description: Only records created or modified since this timestamp will be returned

idempotencyKey.name: Idempotency-Key
idempotencyKey.description: This allows you to safely retry requests without the risk of duplicate processing. 128 character max.

includeOnline.name: IncludeOnline
includeOnline.description: Allows an attachment to be seen by the end customer within their online invoice

summaryOnly.name: summaryOnly
summaryOnly.description: Use summaryOnly=true in GET Contacts and Invoices endpoint to retrieve a smaller version of the response object. This returns only lightweight fields, excluding computation-heavy fields from the response, making the API calls quick and efficient.

searchTerm.name: searchTerm
searchTerm.description: Search parameter that performs a case-insensitive text search across the fields e.g. InvoiceNumber, Reference.

FromDate.name: fromDate
FromDate.description: filter by the from date of the report e.g. 2021-02-01

ToDate.name: toDate
ToDate.description: filter by the to date of the report e.g. 2021-02-28

pageSize.name: pageSize
pageSize.description: Number of records to retrieve per page

ContentType.name: contentType
ContentType.description: The mime type of the attachment file you are retrieving i.e image/jpg, application/pdf

BankTransactionID.name: BankTransactionID
BankTransactionID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for a bank transaction

BankTransferID.name: BankTransferID
BankTransferID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for a bank transfer

BrandingThemeID.name: BrandingThemeID
BrandingThemeID.description: Unique identifier for a Branding Theme

ContactGroupID.name: ContactGroupID
ContactGroupID.description: Unique identifier for a Contact Group

CreditNoteID.name: CreditNoteID
CreditNoteID.description: Unique identifier for a Credit Note

OrganisationID.name: OrganisationID
OrganisationID.description: The unique Xero identifier for an organisation

PurchaseOrderID.name: PurchaseOrderID
PurchaseOrderID.description: Unique identifier for an Purchase Order

RepeatingInvoiceID.name: RepeatingInvoiceID
RepeatingInvoiceID.description: Unique identifier for a Repeating Invoice

TrackingOptionID.name: TrackingOptionID
TrackingOptionID.description: Unique identifier for a Tracking Option

400Error.description: A failed request due to validation error

HistoryRecordCreated.description: Success - return response of type HistoryRecords array of HistoryRecord objects

HistoryRetrieved.description: Success - return response of HistoryRecords array of 0 to N HistoryRecord

Code.description: Customer defined alpha numeric account code e.g 200 or SALES (max length = 10)

AccountID.description: The Xero identifier for an account – specified as a string following  the endpoint name   e.g. /297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

BankAccountNumber.description: For bank accounts only (Account Type BANK)

Status.description: Accounts with a status of ACTIVE can be updated to ARCHIVED. See Account Status Codes

Description.description: Description of the Account. Valid for all types of accounts except bank accounts (max length = 4000)

BankAccountType.description: For bank accounts only. See Bank Account types

EnablePaymentsToAccount.description: Boolean – describes whether account can have payments applied to it

ShowInExpenseClaims.description: Boolean – describes whether account code is available for use with expense claims

SystemAccount.description: If this is a system account then this element is returned. See System Account types. Note that non-system accounts may have this element set as either “” or null.

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if an account has an attachment (read only)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Last modified date UTC format

AddToWatchlist.description: Boolean – describes whether the account is shown in the watchlist widget on the dashboard

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Url.description: URL to the file on xero.com

IncludeOnline.description: Include the file with the online invoice

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

IsReconciled.description: Boolean to show if transaction is reconciled

Reference.description: Reference for the transaction. Only supported for SPEND and RECEIVE transactions.

CurrencyRate.description: Exchange rate to base currency when money is spent or received. e.g.0.7500 Only used for bank transactions in non base currency. If this isn’t specified for non base currency accounts then either the user-defined rate (preference) or the XE.com day rate will be used. Setting currency is only supported on overpayments.

Url.description: URL link to a source document – shown as “Go to App Name”

Status.description: See Bank Transaction Status Codes

SubTotal.description: Total of bank transaction excluding taxes

Total.description: Total of bank transaction tax inclusive

BankTransactionID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for bank transaction

PrepaymentID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for a Prepayment. This will be returned on BankTransactions with a Type of SPEND-PREPAYMENT or RECEIVE-PREPAYMENT

OverpaymentID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for an Overpayment. This will be returned on BankTransactions with a Type of SPEND-OVERPAYMENT or RECEIVE-OVERPAYMENT

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Last modified date UTC format

HasAttachments.description: Boolean to indicate if a bank transaction has an attachment

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

LineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element. See Line Amount Types

Description.description: Description needs to be at least 1 char long. A line item with just a description (i.e no unit amount or quantity) can be created by specifying just a <Description> element that contains at least 1 character

AccountID.description: The associated account ID related to this line item

TaxAmount.description: The tax amount is auto calculated as a percentage of the line amount (see below) based on the tax rate. This value can be overriden if the calculated <TaxAmount> is not correct.

LineAmount.description: If you wish to omit either the Quantity or UnitAmount you can provide a LineAmount and Xero will calculate the missing amount for you. The line amount reflects the discounted price if either a DiscountRate or DiscountAmount has been used i.e. LineAmount = Quantity * Unit Amount * ((100 - DiscountRate)/100) or LineAmount = (Quantity * UnitAmount) - DiscountAmount

Tracking.description: Optional Tracking Category – see Tracking.  Any LineItem can have a  maximum of 2 <TrackingCategory> elements.

DiscountRate.description: Percentage discount being applied to a line item (only supported on  ACCREC invoices – ACC PAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts

DiscountAmount.description: Discount amount being applied to a line item. Only supported on ACCREC invoices and quotes. ACCPAY invoices and credit notes in Xero do not support discounts.

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: The Xero identifier for a Repeating Invoice

SalesTaxCodeId.description: The ID of the sales tax code

TaxBreakdown.description: An array of tax components defined for this line item

Name.description: The name of the item (max length = 50)

ItemID.description: The Xero identifier for an Item

TrackingCategoryID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking category

TrackingOptionID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking category option

Name.description: The name of the tracking category

Date.description: The date of the Transfer YYYY-MM-DD

BankTransferID.description: The identifier of the Bank Transfer

FromBankTransactionID.description: The Bank Transaction ID for the source account

ToBankTransactionID.description: The Bank Transaction ID for the destination account

FromIsReconciled.description: The Bank Transaction boolean to show if it is reconciled for the source account

ToIsReconciled.description: The Bank Transaction boolean to show if it is reconciled for the destination account

HasAttachments.description: Boolean to indicate if a Bank Transfer has an attachment

CreatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of creation date of bank transfer

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Reference.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

Particulars.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

Code.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

Details.description: (Non-NZ Only) These details are sent to the org’s bank as a reference for the batch payment transaction. They will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement imported into Xero. Maximum field length = 18

Narrative.description: (UK Only) Only shows on the statement line in Xero. Max length =18

BatchPaymentID.description: The Xero generated unique identifier for the bank transaction (read-only)

DateString.description: Date the payment is being made (YYYY-MM-DD) e.g. 2009-09-06

Date.description: Date the payment is being made (YYYY-MM-DD) e.g. 2009-09-06

Amount.description: The amount of the payment. Must be less than or equal to the outstanding amount owing on the invoice e.g. 200.00

Type.description: PAYBATCH for bill payments or RECBATCH for sales invoice payments (read-only)

Status.description: AUTHORISED or DELETED (read-only). New batch payments will have a status of AUTHORISED. It is not possible to delete batch payments via the API.

TotalAmount.description: The total of the payments that make up the batch (read-only)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the payment

IsReconciled.description: Booelan that tells you if the batch payment has been reconciled (read-only)

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

BatchPaymentDetails.description: Bank details for use on a batch payment stored with each contact

BankAccountNumber.description: Bank account number for use with Batch Payments

BankAccountName.description: Name of bank for use with Batch Payments

Details.description: (Non-NZ Only) These details are sent to the org’s bank as a reference for the batch payment transaction. They will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement imported into Xero. Maximum field length = 18

Code.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

Reference.description: (NZ Only) Optional references for the batch payment transaction. It will also show with the batch payment transaction in the bank reconciliation Find & Match screen. Depending on your individual bank, the detail may also show on the bank statement you import into Xero.

BatchPaymentID.description: The Xero generated unique identifier for the bank transaction (read-only)

Status.description: The status of the batch payment.
The status of the batch payment.

LogoUrl.description: The location of the image file used as the logo on this branding theme

SortOrder.description: Integer – ranked order of branding theme. The default branding theme has a value of 0

CreatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of creation date of branding theme

PayNowText.description: The text displayed on the Pay Now button in Xero Online Invoicing. If this is not set it will default to Pay by credit card

PaymentServiceType.description: This will always be CUSTOM for payment services created via the API.

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

MergedToContactID.description: ID for the destination of a merged contact. Only returned when using paging or when fetching a contact by ContactId or ContactNumber.

ContactNumber.description: This can be updated via the API only i.e. This field is read only on the Xero contact screen, used to identify contacts in external systems (max length = 50). If the Contact Number is used, this is displayed as Contact Code in the Contacts UI in Xero.

AccountNumber.description: A user defined account number. This can be updated via the API and the Xero UI (max length = 50)

ContactStatus.description: Current status of a contact – see contact status types

FirstName.description: First name of contact person (max length = 255)

LastName.description: Last name of contact person (max length = 255)

EmailAddress.description: Email address of contact person (umlauts not supported) (max length  = 255)

TaxNumber.description: Tax number of contact – this is also known as the ABN (Australia), GST Number (New Zealand), VAT Number (UK) or Tax ID Number (US and global) in the Xero UI depending on which regionalized version of Xero you are using (max length = 50)

Addresses.description: Store certain address types for a contact – see address types

Phones.description: Store certain phone types for a contact – see phone types

IsSupplier.description: true or false – Boolean that describes if a contact that has any AP  invoices entered against them. Cannot be set via PUT or POST – it is automatically set when an accounts payable invoice is generated against this contact.

IsCustomer.description: true or false – Boolean that describes if a contact has any AR invoices entered against them. Cannot be set via PUT or POST – it is automatically set when an accounts receivable invoice is generated against this contact.

SalesDefaultLineAmountType.description: The default sales line amount type for a contact. Only available when summaryOnly parameter or paging is used, or when fetch by ContactId or ContactNumber.

PurchasesDefaultLineAmountType.description: The default purchases line amount type for a contact Only available when summaryOnly parameter or paging is used, or when fetch by ContactId or ContactNumber.

SalesDefaultAccountCode.description: The default sales account code for contacts

PurchasesDefaultAccountCode.description: The default purchases account code for contacts

SalesTrackingCategories.description: The default sales tracking categories for contacts

PurchasesTrackingCategories.description: The default purchases tracking categories for contacts

TrackingCategoryName.description: The name of the Tracking Category assigned to the contact under SalesTrackingCategories and PurchasesTrackingCategories

TrackingCategoryOption.description: The name of the Tracking Option assigned to the contact under SalesTrackingCategories and PurchasesTrackingCategories

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to contact

ContactGroups.description: Displays which contact groups a contact is included in

Discount.description: The default discount rate for the contact (read only)

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

HasAttachments.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an attachment

ValidationErrors.description: Displays validation errors returned from the API

HasValidationErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

Type.description: Type of Budget. OVERALL or TRACKING

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to budget

Notes.description: Any footnotes associated with this balance

Balances.description: The raw AccountsReceivable(sales invoices) and AccountsPayable(bills) outstanding and overdue amounts, not converted to base currency (read only)

CISEnabled.description: Boolean that describes if the contact is a CIS Subcontractor

Rate.description: CIS Deduction rate for the contact if he is a subcontractor. If the contact is not CISEnabled, then the rate is not returned

CISContractorEnabled.description: true or false - Boolean that describes if the organisation is a CIS Contractor

CISSubContractorEnabled.description: true or false - Boolean that describes if the organisation is a CIS SubContractor

Rate.description: CIS Deduction rate for the organisation

IncludeInEmails.description: boolean to indicate whether contact should be included on emails with invoices etc.

Name.description: The Name of the contact group. Required when creating a new contact  group

Status.description: The Status of a contact group. To delete a contact group update the status to DELETED. Only contact groups with a status of ACTIVE are returned on GETs.

ContactGroupID.description: The Xero identifier for an contact group – specified as a string following the endpoint name. e.g. /297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

Contacts.description: The ContactID and Name of Contacts in a contact group. Returned on GETs when the ContactGroupID is supplied in the URL.

Status.description: Need at least one field to create an empty JSON payload

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Date.description: The date the credit note is issued YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified then it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

Status.description: See Credit Note Status Codes

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the credit note excluding taxes

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the credit note

Total.description: The total of the Credit Note(subtotal + total tax)

CISRate.description: CIS Deduction rate for the organisation

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the credit note

FullyPaidOnDate.description: Date when credit note was fully paid(UTC format)

CreditNoteNumber.description: ACCRECCREDIT – Unique alpha numeric code identifying credit note (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings)

SentToContact.description: Boolean to set whether the credit note in the Xero app should be marked as “sent”. This can be set only on credit notes that have been approved

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the Credit Note

AppliedAmount.description: The amount of applied to an invoice

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a credit note has an attachment

HasErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a credit note has an validation errors

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

InvoiceAddresses.description: An array of addresses used to auto calculate sales tax

Amount.description: the amount being applied to the invoice

Date.description: the date the allocation is applied YYYY-MM-DD.

IsDeleted.description: A flag that returns true when the allocation is succesfully deleted

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

CurrencyCode.description: 3 letter alpha code for the currency – see list of currency codes

EmployeeID.description: The Xero identifier for an employee e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

Status.description: Current status of an employee – see contact status types

FirstName.description: First name of an employee (max length = 255)

LastName.description: Last name of an employee (max length = 255)

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

ExpenseClaimID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for an expense claim

Status.description: Current status of an expense claim – see status types

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Last modified date UTC format

Total.description: The total of an expense claim being paid

AmountDue.description: The amount due to be paid for an expense claim

AmountPaid.description: The amount still to pay for an expense claim

PaymentDueDate.description: The date when the expense claim is due to be paid YYYY-MM-DD

ReportingDate.description: The date the expense claim will be reported in Xero YYYY-MM-DD

ReceiptID.description: The Xero identifier for the Receipt e.g. e59a2c7f-1306-4078-a0f3-73537afcbba9

DateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of creation date of branding theme

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Date.description: Date invoice was issued – YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

InvoiceNumber.description: ACCREC – Unique alpha numeric code identifying invoice (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings) (max length = 255)

Url.description: URL link to a source document – shown as “Go to [appName]” in the Xero app

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency invoice. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used. (max length = [18].[6])

Status.description: See Invoice Status Codes

SentToContact.description: Boolean to set whether the invoice in the Xero app should be marked as “sent”. This can be set only on invoices that have been approved

ExpectedPaymentDate.description: Shown on sales invoices (Accounts Receivable) when this has been set

PlannedPaymentDate.description: Shown on bills (Accounts Payable) when this has been set

CISRate.description: CIS Deduction rate for the organisation

Total.description: Total of Invoice tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax). This will be ignored if it doesn’t equal the sum of the LineAmounts

TotalDiscount.description: Total of discounts applied on the invoice line items

InvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for invoice

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for repeating invoices

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if an invoice has an attachment

IsDiscounted.description: boolean to indicate if an invoice has a discount

AmountDue.description: Amount remaining to be paid on invoice

AmountPaid.description: Sum of payments received for invoice

FullyPaidOnDate.description: The date the invoice was fully paid. Only returned on fully paid invoices

AmountCredited.description: Sum of all credit notes, over-payments and pre-payments applied to invoice

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Last modified date UTC format

CreditNotes.description: Details of credit notes that have been applied to an invoice

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

HasErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a invoice has an validation errors

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

InvoiceAddresses.description: An array of addresses used to auto calculate sales tax

OnlineInvoiceUrl.description: the URL to an online invoice

InventoryAssetAccountCode.description: The inventory asset account for the item. The account must be of type INVENTORY. The  COGSAccountCode in PurchaseDetails is also required to create a tracked item

Name.description: The name of the item (max length = 50)

IsSold.description: Boolean value, defaults to true. When IsSold is true the item will be available on sales transactions in the Xero UI. If IsSold is updated to false then Description and SalesDetails values will be nulled.

IsPurchased.description: Boolean value, defaults to true. When IsPurchased is true the item is available for purchase transactions in the Xero UI. If IsPurchased is updated to false then PurchaseDescription and PurchaseDetails values will be nulled.

Description.description: The sales description of the item (max length = 4000)

PurchaseDescription.description: The purchase description of the item (max length = 4000)

IsTrackedAsInventory.description: True for items that are tracked as inventory. An item will be tracked as inventory if the InventoryAssetAccountCode and COGSAccountCode are set.

TotalCostPool.description: The value of the item on hand. Calculated using average cost accounting.

QuantityOnHand.description: The quantity of the item on hand

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Last modified date in UTC format

ItemID.description: The Xero identifier for an Item

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

UnitPrice.description: Unit Price of the item. By default UnitPrice is rounded to two decimal places. You can use 4 decimal places by adding the unitdp=4 querystring parameter to your request.

AccountCode.description: Default account code to be used for purchased/sale. Not applicable to the purchase details of tracked items

COGSAccountCode.description: Cost of goods sold account. Only applicable to the purchase details of tracked items.

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Reference.description: reference field for additional indetifying information

SourceID.description: The identifier for the source transaction (e.g. InvoiceID)

SourceType.description: The journal source type. The type of transaction that created the journal

Description.description: The description from the source transaction line item. Only returned if populated.

NetAmount.description: Net amount of journal line. This will be a positive value for a debit and negative for a credit

GrossAmount.description: Gross amount of journal line (NetAmount + TaxAmount).

TaxAmount.description: Total tax on a journal line

TrackingCategories.description: Optional Tracking Category – see Tracking. Any JournalLine can have a maximum of 2 <TrackingCategory> elements.

SourceTransactionID.description: Filter by the SourceTransactionID. Get all the linked transactions created from a particular ACCPAY invoice

SourceLineItemID.description: The line item identifier from the source transaction.

ContactID.description: Filter by the combination of ContactID and Status. Get all the linked transactions that have been assigned to a particular customer and have a particular status e.g. GET /LinkedTransactions?ContactID=4bb34b03-3378-4bb2-a0ed-6345abf3224e&Status=APPROVED.

TargetTransactionID.description: Filter by the TargetTransactionID. Get all the linked transactions  allocated to a particular ACCREC invoice

TargetLineItemID.description: The line item identifier from the target transaction. It is possible  to link multiple billable expenses to the same TargetLineItemID.

LinkedTransactionID.description: The Xero identifier for an Linked Transaction e.g./LinkedTransactions/297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

Status.description: Filter by the combination of ContactID and Status. Get all the linked transactions that have been assigned to a particular customer and have a particular status e.g. GET /LinkedTransactions?ContactID=4bb34b03-3378-4bb2-a0ed-6345abf3224e&Status=APPROVED.

Type.description: This will always be BILLABLEEXPENSE. More types may be added in future.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: The last modified date in UTC format

SourceTransactionTypeCode.description: The Type of the source tranasction. This will be ACCPAY if the linked transaction was created from an invoice and SPEND if it was created from a bank transaction.

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Status.description: See Manual Journal Status Codes

Url.description: Url link to a source document – shown as “Go to [appName]” in the Xero app

ShowOnCashBasisReports.description: Boolean – default is true if not specified

HasAttachments.description: Boolean to indicate if a manual journal has an attachment

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Last modified date UTC format

ManualJournalID.description: The Xero identifier for a Manual Journal

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

LineAmount.description: total for line. Debits are positive, credits are negative value

Tracking.description: Optional Tracking Category – see Tracking. Any JournalLine can have a maximum of 2 <TrackingCategory> elements.

TaxAmount.description: The calculated tax amount based on the TaxType and LineAmount

Name.description: Name of the actions for this organisation

Status.description: Status of the action for this organisation

APIKey.description: Display a unique key used for Xero-to-Xero transactions

Name.description: Display name of organisation shown in Xero

PaysTax.description: Boolean to describe if organisation is registered with a local tax authority i.e. true, false

IsDemoCompany.description: Boolean to describe if organisation is a demo company.

OrganisationStatus.description: Will be set to ACTIVE if you can connect to organisation via the Xero API

RegistrationNumber.description: Shows for New Zealand, Australian and UK organisations

TaxNumber.description: Shown if set. Displays in the Xero UI as Tax File Number (AU), GST Number (NZ), VAT Number (UK) and Tax ID Number (US & Global).

SalesTaxBasis.description: The accounting basis used for tax returns. See Sales Tax Basis

SalesTaxPeriod.description: The frequency with which tax returns are processed. See Sales Tax Period

DefaultSalesTax.description: The default for LineAmountTypes on sales transactions

DefaultPurchasesTax.description: The default for LineAmountTypes on purchase transactions

PeriodLockDate.description: Shown if set. See lock dates

EndOfYearLockDate.description: Shown if set. See lock dates

CreatedDateUTC.description: Timestamp when the organisation was created in Xero

ShortCode.description: A unique identifier for the organisation. Potential uses.

Class.description: Organisation Classes describe which plan the Xero organisation is on (e.g. DEMO, TRIAL, PREMIUM)

Edition.description: BUSINESS or PARTNER. Partner edition organisations are sold exclusively through accounting partners and have restricted functionality (e.g. no access to invoicing)

LineOfBusiness.description: Description of business type as defined in Organisation settings

Addresses.description: Address details for organisation – see Addresses

Phones.description: Phones details for organisation – see Phones

ExternalLinks.description: Organisation profile links for popular services such as Facebook,Twitter, GooglePlus and LinkedIn. You can also add link to your website here. Shown if Organisation settings  is updated in Xero. See ExternalLinks below

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Date.description: The date the overpayment is created YYYY-MM-DD

Status.description: See Overpayment Status Codes

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the overpayment excluding taxes

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the overpayment

Total.description: The total of the overpayment (subtotal + total tax)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the overpayment

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency overpayment. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the overpayment

AppliedAmount.description: The amount of applied to an invoice

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a overpayment has an attachment

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Status.description: The status of the payment.

InvoiceNumber.description: Number of invoice or credit note you are applying payment to e.g.INV-4003

CreditNoteNumber.description: Number of invoice or credit note you are applying payment to e.g. INV-4003

Code.description: Code of account you are using to make the payment e.g. 001 (note- not all accounts have a code value)

Date.description: Date the payment is being made (YYYY-MM-DD) e.g. 2009-09-06

CurrencyRate.description: Exchange rate when payment is received. Only used for non base currency invoices and credit notes e.g. 0.7500

Amount.description: The amount of the payment. Must be less than or equal to the outstanding amount owing on the invoice e.g. 200.00

BankAmount.description: The amount of the payment in the currency of the bank account.

Reference.description: An optional description for the payment e.g. Direct Debit

IsReconciled.description: An optional parameter for the payment. A boolean indicating whether you would like the payment to be created as reconciled when using PUT, or whether a payment has been reconciled when using GET

Status.description: The status of the payment.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the payment

PaymentID.description: The Xero identifier for an Payment e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

BatchPaymentID.description: Present if the payment was created as part of a batch.

BankAccountNumber.description: The suppliers bank account number the payment is being made to

Particulars.description: The suppliers bank account number the payment is being made to

Details.description: The information to appear on the supplier's bank account

HasAccount.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

HasValidationErrors.description: A boolean to indicate if a contact has an validation errors

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API
Displays array of warning messages from the API

Date.description: The date the prepayment is created YYYY-MM-DD

Status.description: See Prepayment Status Codes

SubTotal.description: The subtotal of the prepayment excluding taxes

TotalTax.description: The total tax on the prepayment

Total.description: The total of the prepayment(subtotal + total tax)

Reference.description: Returns Invoice number field. Reference field isn't available.

UpdatedDateUTC.description: UTC timestamp of last update to the prepayment

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency prepayment. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used

RemainingCredit.description: The remaining credit balance on the prepayment

AppliedAmount.description: The amount of applied to an invoice

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a prepayment has an attachment

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Date.description: Date purchase order was issued – YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified then it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

DeliveryDate.description: Date the goods are to be delivered – YYYY-MM-DD

PurchaseOrderNumber.description: Unique alpha numeric code identifying purchase order (when missing will auto-generate from your Organisation Invoice Settings)

Status.description: See Purchase Order Status Codes

SentToContact.description: Boolean to set whether the purchase order should be marked as “sent”. This can be set only on purchase orders that have been approved or billed

DeliveryAddress.description: The address the goods are to be delivered to

AttentionTo.description: The person that the delivery is going to

Telephone.description: The phone number for the person accepting the delivery

DeliveryInstructions.description: A free text feild for instructions (500 characters max)

ExpectedArrivalDate.description: The date the goods are expected to arrive.

PurchaseOrderID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for purchase order

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency purchase order. If no rate is specified, the XE.com day rate is used.

SubTotal.description: Total of purchase order excluding taxes

Total.description: Total of Purchase Order tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)

TotalDiscount.description: Total of discounts applied on the purchase order line items

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a purchase order has an attachment

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Last modified date UTC format

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

QuoteID.description: QuoteID GUID is automatically generated and is returned after create or GET.

QuoteNumber.description: Unique alpha numeric code identifying a quote (Max Length = 255)

Date.description: Date quote was issued – YYYY-MM-DD. If the Date element is not specified it will default to the current date based on the timezone setting of the organisation

CurrencyRate.description: The currency rate for a multicurrency quote

Total.description: Total of Quote tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax). This will be ignored if it doesn’t equal the sum of the LineAmounts

TotalDiscount.description: Total of discounts applied on the quote line items

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Last modified date UTC format

StatusAttributeString.description: A string to indicate if a invoice status

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

QuoteLineAmountTypes.description: Line amounts are exclusive of tax by default if you don’t specify this element. See Line Amount Types

Total.description: Total of receipt tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)

ReceiptID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for receipt

Status.description: Current status of receipt – see status types

ReceiptNumber.description: Xero generated sequence number for receipt in current claim for a given user

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Last modified date UTC format

HasAttachments.description: boolean to indicate if a receipt has an attachment

Url.description: URL link to a source document – shown as “Go to [appName]” in the Xero app

ValidationErrors.description: Displays array of validation error messages from the API

Warnings.description: Displays array of warning messages from the API

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

Status.description: One of the following - DRAFT or AUTHORISED – See Invoice Status Codes

Total.description: Total of Invoice tax inclusive (i.e. SubTotal + TotalTax)

RepeatingInvoiceID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for repeating invoice template

ID.description: Xero generated unique identifier for repeating invoice template

HasAttachments.description: Boolean to indicate if an invoice has an attachment

Attachments.description: Displays array of attachments from the API

ApprovedForSending.description: Boolean to indicate whether the invoice has been approved for sending

SendCopy.description: Boolean to indicate whether a copy is sent to sender's email

MarkAsSent.description: Boolean to indicate whether the invoice in the Xero app displays as "sent"

IncludePDF.description: Boolean to indicate whether to include PDF attachment

ReportTitles.description: Report titles array (3 to 4 strings with the report name, orgnisation name and time frame of report)

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Updated Date
Updated Date

Period.description: Integer used with the unit e.g. 1 (every 1 week), 2 (every 2 months)

Unit.description: One of the following - WEEKLY or MONTHLY

DueDate.description: Integer used with due date type e.g 20 (of following month), 31 (of current month)

StartDate.description: Date the first invoice of the current version of the repeating schedule was generated (changes when repeating invoice is edited)

NextScheduledDate.description: The calendar date of the next invoice in the schedule to be generated

EndDate.description: Invoice end date – only returned if the template has an end date set

TaxType.description: See Tax Types – can only be used on update calls

ConversionBalances.description: Balance supplied for each account that has a value as at the conversion date.

ConversionDate.description: The date when the organisation starts using Xero

Month.description: The month the organisation starts using Xero. Value is an integer between 1 and 12

Year.description: The year the organisation starts using Xero. Value is an integer greater than 2006

ConversionBalances.description: Balance supplied for each account that has a value as at the conversion date.

AccountCode.description: The account code for a account

Balance.description: The opening balances of the account. Debits are positive, credits are negative values

BalanceDetails.description: An array to specify multiple currency balances of an account

Balance.description: The opening balances of the account. Debits are positive, credits are negative values

CurrencyCode.description: The currency of the balance (Not required for base currency)

CurrencyRate.description: (Optional) Exchange rate to base currency when money is spent or received. If not specified, XE rate for the day is applied

ImportSummary.description: A summary of the import from setup endpoint

ImportSummaryAccounts.description: A summary of the accounts changes

Total.description: The total number of accounts in the org

New.description: The number of new accounts created

Errored.description: The number of accounts that had an error

NewOrUpdated.description: The number of new or updated accounts

Status.description: See Status Codes

CanApplyToAssets.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for asset accounts i.e.  true,false

CanApplyToEquity.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for equity accounts i.e true,false

CanApplyToExpenses.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for expense accounts  i.e. true,false

CanApplyToLiabilities.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for liability accounts  i.e. true,false

CanApplyToRevenue.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate can be used for revenue accounts i.e. true,false

IsCompound.description: Boolean to describe if Tax rate is compounded.

IsNonRecoverable.description: Boolean to describe if tax rate is non-recoverable. Non-recoverable rates are only applicable to Canadian organisations

TrackingCategoryID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking category e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

TrackingOptionID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking option e.g. dc54c220-0140-495a-b925-3246adc0075f

Name.description: The name of the tracking category e.g. Department, Region (max length = 100)

Option.description: The option name of the tracking option e.g. East, West (max length = 100)

Status.description: The status of a tracking category

TrackingOptionID.description: The Xero identifier for a tracking option e.g. ae777a87-5ef3-4fa0-a4f0-d10e1f13073a

Name.description: The name of the tracking option e.g. Marketing, East (max length = 100)

Status.description: The status of a tracking option

TrackingCategoryID.description: Filter by a tracking category e.g. 297c2dc5-cc47-4afd-8ec8-74990b8761e9

TrackingCategoryName.description: The default sales tracking category name for contacts

TrackingOptionName.description: The default purchase tracking category name for contacts

UpdatedDateUTC.description: Timestamp of last change to user

IsSubscriber.description: Boolean to indicate if user is the subscriber

OrganisationRole.description: User role that defines permissions in Xero and via API (READONLY, INVOICEONLY, STANDARD, FINANCIALADVISER, etc)

Elements.description: Array of Elements of validation Errors

BatchPaymentID.description: Unique ID for batch payment object with validation error

InvoiceAddressType.description: Indicates whether the address is defined as origin (FROM) or destination (TO)

AddressLine1.description: First line of a physical address

AddressLine2.description: Second line of a physical address

AddressLine3.description: Third line of a physical address

AddressLine4.description: Fourth line of a physical address

Region.description: Region or state of a physical address

PostalCode.description: Postal code of a physical address

TaxComponentId.description: The unique ID number of this component

NonTaxableAmount.description: The amount that is not taxable

StateAssignedNo.description: The state assigned number of the jurisdiction

JurisdictionRegion.description: Name identifying the region within the country
